attributes.action: to investigate the introdution of discounted lloyds tsb staff morgage rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned petition the prime minister to investigate the huge discounts offered to lloyds tsb staff on their mortgages,high discounts to staff using public money to subsidise,
as you know there has been a high increase in reposessions,i am sure the public money was meant to help ease the financial needs of those who need it most.
